windows.command: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (-Not (Test-Path .venv)) { py -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; if (Test-Path requirements.txt) { python -m pip install -r requirements.txt }; python -m pip install ipykernel notebook jupyter_client traitlets tornado nest-asyncio; python -m ipykernel install --user --name .venv --display-name 'Python (.venv)'"

osx.command: bash -lc 'PY_BIN=$(command -v python3 || command -v python || echo ""); if command -v pyenv >/dev/null 2>&1; then eval "$(pyenv init -)"; PY_BIN=$(pyenv which python 2>/dev/null || echo "$PY_BIN"); fi; [ -n "$PY_BIN" ] || { echo "No python interpreter found"; exit 127; }; [ -d .venv ] || "$PY_BIN" -m venv .venv; source .venv/bin/activate; "$PY_BIN" -m pip install --upgrade pip; [ -f requirements.txt ] && "$PY_BIN" -m pip install -r requirements.txt || true; "$PY_BIN" -m pip install ipykernel notebook jupyter_client traitlets tornado nest-asyncio; "$PY_BIN" -m ipykernel install --user --name .venv --display-name "Python (.venv)"'

linux.command: bash -lc 'PY_BIN=$(command -v python3 || command -v python || echo ""); if command -v pyenv >/dev/null 2>&1; then eval "$(pyenv init -)"; PY_BIN=$(pyenv which python 2>/dev/null || echo "$PY_BIN"); fi; [ -n "$PY_BIN" ] || { echo "No python interpreter found"; exit 127; }; [ -d .venv ] || "$PY_BIN" -m venv .venv; source .venv/bin/activate; "$PY_BIN" -m pip install --upgrade pip; [ -f requirements.txt ] && "$PY_BIN" -m pip install -r requirements.txt || true; "$PY_BIN" -m pip install ipykernel notebook jupyter_client traitlets tornado nest-asyncio; "$PY_BIN" -m ipykernel install --user --name .venv --display-name "Python (.venv)"'
